name: Deeper-Geddon
description:
Take command. All of civilization has only minutes until oblivion. Drill a deep enough hole into the approaching asteroid. Fill it with explosives. And save everyone with a gigantic BOOOM.

Mine resources, build factories and connect them with conveyors to produce all the goods you need in this fully functional factory simulation game. And hurry.

Change Log v1.2

  • Fixed game balance
